thread.title: Recipe: Chicken Rogan Josh

title: Recipe: Chicken Rogan Josh
text:
How to make Chicken Rogan Josh Step 1 
Heat 2 tablespoons of ghee and fry garlic for 1 minute. Step 2 
Add cumin, green chilli and ginger, fry for few more minutes. Step 3 
Wash chicken, cut into strips and stir fry for 5-6 minutes. Step 4 
Remove chicken with slotted spoon and put it to one side, leaving the oil in the wok. Step 5 
Add remaining oil, spices and yoghurt and fry for 1 minute. Step 6 
Now add chopped onions and more oil if required. Saute for few minutes and add the chicken pieces. Stir for 10 mins on low heat. Add water if you feel it is drying out. Step 7 
Add tomato puree and coriander leaves (leave some for garnishing ). Mix well. Step 8 
Add red chilli sauce to taste and large tomato slices, allow it to cook for 25-30 minutes. Step 9 
Garnish with chopped coriander leaves and lime juice. Step 10
